content.question: How did the researcher operationally define the dependent variable in this research?

choices.label: Positive comments or no comments in the syllabus
Scores on the end-of-semester student course evaluations
The group of students receiving the positive comments
The group of students receiving no comments

content.answer: Scores on the end-of-semester student course evaluations

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
